main event: A witness observed a bright, fuzzy or hazy object in the sky over Lynbrook, New York on May 28, 1967 at around 9:00 PM.
interesting points: The object was saucer-shaped and did not make any sound.
The object hovered for approximately 25-30 minutes and had a bright light on top that was revolving or blinking.
The object appeared to have some kind of force field surrounding it, as a small plane approached it and seemed to be 'pushed' back.
The object then suddenly shot straight up at a tremendous speed and disappeared from sight.
Many local residents, including some very reliable and respectable people, have reported seeing similar objects in the area.
sighted object: Saucer-shaped object with a bright, revolving or blinking light on top
witnesses: Witness, possibly a member of a local flying club
